text: Now I have prepared with all my might for the house of my God the gold for the <FI>things of<Fi> gold, and the silver for the <FI>things of<Fi> silver, and the brass for the <FI>things of<Fi> brass, the iron for the <FI>things of<Fi> iron, and wood for the <FI>things of<Fi> wood; onyx stones, and <FI>stones<Fi> to be set, stones for inlaid work, and of divers colors, and all manner of precious stones, and marble stones in abundance. <FI>
name: I Chronicles 29:2
